attributes.comment:
DHS Docket No.USCIS-2006-0044 The proposed increases of fees is criminal.
These increases make becoming a U.S. citizen unattainable for the average
immigrant. This will only discourage immigrants from participating in the legal
immigration process. Is the American Dream now only for the rich? I can not
help but think of my own great-great grandfather, arriving from Ireland, with a nickel
in his pocket. How far have we come from the poem on the Statue of Liberty.
The USCIS is antiquated and desperately needs to be retooled to meet the needs
of the 21st. century but not on the backs of the immigrants. Increase fines on
companies employing illegal aliens and funnel that money to the USCIS.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Bridget M. Larkin
